hero.title: Keep control of your
hero.description2: application monitors your P&L via OCR, enforces your risk rules (Max Loss, Drawdown, Daily Goal) and triggers

socialProof.voiceAlerts: ‚úÖ Voice alerts in French/English, adjustable in real time.

items.title: üéØ Automated Discipline
items.description: Set your risk limits once. Our AI monitors your P&L in real-time and alerts you instantly before emotions take over. Avoid 90% of emotional losses.

items.title: üîä Robust Audio/Voice
items.description: Your personalized alert system. A sound or voice warns you immediately when you breach your limits. Stay in control despite emotions.

items.title: üåç International
items.description: Your linguistic comfort guaranteed. French or English, choose your language. Maximize your performance by staying in your comfort zone.

items.title: ‚ö° Quick Setup
items.description: Simple configuration. In a few clicks, you're operational. Select your P&L zone, choose your alerts and let the magic happen.

items.title: üìä Tracking & Analysis
items.description: Analyze your performance in detail. Monthly calendar of your results, evolution charts and personalized monthly goals. Transform your data into winning strategies.

items.title: üîÑ Continuous Evolution
items.description: Grow with us. Regular updates based on your questions and feedback, for an experience that constantly improves.

howItWorks.title: How it works
steps: Download and install the app (Windows installation assistant).
Select the P&L zone on your screen and test voice/beeps.
Set your rules: Max Loss, Drawdown, Daily Goal, Red‚ÜíGreen.
Let the app run; it alerts you immediately on breach.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you. Taxes included in price.
pricing.disclaimer: * Prices are indicative for the mockup. We will adjust after validation.

questions.question: How to re-download?
questions.answer: A link + license key are sent to you by email after purchase.

questions.question: Can I change PC?
questions.answer: Yes, via support we can reset your license once per year.

questions.question: Is there a demo?
questions.answer: A demo limited to beeps (without TTS) will be offered.

software.title: Software Overview
software.subtitle: Discover the features of Mindset Alert Strategy

alertWindow.title: Main Alert Window
alertWindow.description: Main interface with real-time P&L monitoring. Configure your risk limits (Max Loss, Drawdown, Daily Goal) and receive instant voice alerts when you breach your thresholds.

statsCalendar.title: Statistics Calendar
statsCalendar.description: Track your performance day by day with the monthly calendar. Quickly visualize your winning and losing sessions, identify your best trading days.

statsChart.title: Statistics Charts
statsChart.description: Analyze your evolution with detailed performance charts. Track your progress, identify trends and optimize your trading strategy.

dailyGoal.title: Daily Goal and Weekly Research
dailyGoal.description: Set your daily goals (Daily Goal) and weekly goals (Weekly Goal). Track your results and analyze your weekly statistics with the Weekly Research section. Stay disciplined and measure your progress week after week.

monthlyGoal.title: Monthly Goal
monthlyGoal.description: Set your monthly goals and track your overall performance. Stay focused on your long-term objectives and celebrate your achievements.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question? Send us a message and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject
contact.success: Message sent successfully! We'll reply soon.
contact.error: Error sending message. Please try again.
